docTitle.titlePart:
Object-oriented development of mobile phone
applications using J2ME

front.div:
Abstract
This report discusess object-oriented development of software which is
run in extremely limited environments, and how this affects the applica-
tion of the principles of good object-oritned design.
The report first gives an introduction to the Java 2 Micro Edition
(J2ME) environment in general with focus on development of applica-
tions for cellular phones using J2ME. Then a discussion about how the
various principles of objekt-oriented design are affected by the limitied
heap memory, storage memory and performance. Tips on optimizations
are given and discussed regarding those issues.
